author: Source: Romsey Advertiser
title: Matt Damon and Jessica Chastain lead the red-carpet glamour at The Martian pr... - Romsey Advertiser
text:
Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain and Kate Mara were among the star-studded cast who dazzled on the red carpet at The Martian's European premiere in Leicester Square. Oscar nominee Chiwetel Ejiofor also greeted the crowds and revealed he would have taken a different career path if he'd seen the sci-fi film, directed by Ridley Scott, as a child.
 Romsey Advertiser.
